column2: ZHONGCHAO INC. is a provider of healthcare information, education, and training services to healthcare professionals and the public in China. Under the MDMOOC brand, the Company offers a wide range of online and onsite health information services, healthcare education programs, and healthcare training products, consisting primarily of clinical practice training, open classes of medical topics, interactive case studies, academic conference and workshops, continuing education courses, and articles and short videos with educational healthcare content to healthcare professionals as well as the public.
